alert.note: Alert for Eastern Loudoun; Prince William, Manassas, Manassas Park; Southern Fauquier (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 8:38PM EST until January 17 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central and northern Maryland and northern Virginia. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Loudoun; Prince William, Manassas, Manassas Park; Southern Fauquier
